tech_news.title: Castlevania: Belmont’s Curse announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC - Gematsu
tech_news.description: Publisher Konami and developers Evil Empire and Motion Twin have announced Castlevania: Belmont’s Curse for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC (Steam). It will launch in 2026.

tech_news.title: God of War Sons of Sparta Side-Scrolling Spin-off Out Today, and God of War Trilogy Remake Announced | Sony State of Play - IGN
Crystal Dynamics just announced the first new Legacy of Kain game in 23 years (and another slick-looking Soul Reaver remaster, too) - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Legacy of Kain is back with an old classic, and some fresh blood: and both release sooner than you'd think.

tech_news.title: Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 2 announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC - Gematsu
tech_news.description: Konami has announced Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 2 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC (Steam). It includes Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots and the HD Col…

tech_news.title: Rayman 30th Anniversary Edition Releases Tomorrow, Collects Five Versions Of The Original Game - Game Informer
tech_news.description: Starting tomorrow you can play the PlayStation, Atari Jaguar, MS-DOS, Game Boy Advance, and Game Boy Color versions of the original Rayman in one release.

tech_news.title: DEAD OR ALIVE New Project announced for PS5 - Gematsu
tech_news.description: Publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Team NINJA have announced DEAD OR ALIVE New Project for PlayStation 5 (other platforms to be confirmed). A release date was not announced.

tech_news.title: Brigandine Abyss announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC - Gematsu
tech_news.description: Happinet Corporation has announced fantasy war strategy RPG Brigandine: Abyss for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC (Steam). It will launch in 2026. NIS America will publish the game in …

tech_news.title: Sony State of Play February 2026: Everything announced - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Here's everything announced during the February 2026 Sony State of Play.

tech_news.title: Attackers prompted Gemini over 100,000 times while trying to clone it, Google says - Ars Technica
tech_news.description: Distillation technique lets copycats mimic Gemini at a fraction of the development cost.

tech_news.title: Olympic athletes push their bodies to the limit. Should we? - NPR
tech_news.description: Elite athletes often push through pain to achieve victory. But, everyday exercisers need to distinguish between soreness which is normal and pain which is the body's way of telling you to stop.
